item.title: Questlove to Receive SummerStage Icon Award at City Parks Foundation Gala
item.description: Ahmir “Questlove” Thompson will be honored with the SummerStage Icon award for his artistic contributions to New York City, the City Parks Foundation has announced. The Grammy-winning artist will DJ a
